item.title: How To Add a Window In Your Quest Tab!
item.dc:creator: @Battle-Quest-Tuts Battle-Quest-Tuts
item.description:
@Battle-Quest-Tuts wrote:

[font=arial black][size=12pt]How To Add a Window In Your Quest Tab![/size][/font]

[font=courier]Difficulty: 1/10[/font]
[font=courier]Files being modified: textHandler.java, clickingMost.java [/font]

[font=arial][size=10pt]What this does is, basically when you press a tab thats in your quest tab it will come up with one of those notifier’s with whatever you wrote in it.[/size][/font]

[font=arial black]Step 1:[/font]

[size=8pt][b][left]First we will start off by opening up “textHandler.java” and searching forif(c.q1 == 0){[/left]

Now, you should see c.sendQuest(" ", 7332); } if(c.q1 > 0){ c.sendQuest(" ", 7332); } if(c.q1 == 15){ c.sendQuest(" ", 7332);

See where the quotes are? put anything inside them in my case its going to be “@gre@Updates!”. When your done go to clickingMost.java and search for case 28164: Under that you should see c.q1help(); break;

on c.q1help(); press Enter at the ; to make a new line after that.

on that new line copy and paste this: c.sendQuest("@gre@Updates!!", 8144); //Title c.sendQuest("Updates done", 8145); c.sendQuest(" ", 8147); c.sendQuest(" ", 8148); c.sendQuest(" ", 8149); c.sendQuest(" ", 8151); c.sendQuest(" ", 8152); c.sendQuest(" ", 8153); c.sendQuest(" ", 8154);

In the quotes put anything in there then save the files and your done (compile it after) please +rep me after if i help and give a thanks

Read full topic
item.source: How To Add a Window In Your Quest Tab!
